summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of mobile formatting improvements, Harvest D2D page enhancements, and name consistency. All test scenarios passed. Mobile viewport (390x844) tested for Landing, Dashboard, Battle Pass, and Claims pages. Desktop viewport (1920x800) tested for Harvest D2D with satellite map, pins, and tabs.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile formatting and Harvest D2D enhancements verified. All sm: breakpoints working. Dark tactical theme (zinc-800/900) applied consistently throughout Harvest.jsx.

checks: Nav shows 'OPERATION EDEN' + 'Deploy' button properly spaced
XP progress bar with readable text
Tier rewards grid responsive (2-col on mobile)
Header shows 'HARVEST' with door count and 'Live' badge
Map controls (Add pin, Locate, Territories, Parcels, Refresh) use dark zinc-800 theme
All tabs work: Map, Ranks, Compete, Badges
Bottom stats bar shows pin status icons

minor: WebSocket error: Event - Non-critical, related to hot reload

mocked_apis_list: /api/battle-pass - hardcoded data as noted by main agent

harvest_d2d_features_verified.map: Satellite tiles load correctly with Leaflet
harvest_d2d_features_verified.pins: Visible on map with color coding by status
harvest_d2d_features_verified.header: Shows 'HARVEST' with door count (55 doors) and 'Live' status badge
harvest_d2d_features_verified.map_controls: Add pin, Locate, Territories, Parcels, Refresh - all dark zinc-800 themed
harvest_d2d_features_verified.bottom_stats: Pin status icons with counts displayed

tabs.Compete: Shows competitions (Daily Blitz, March Door Blitz)
tabs.Badges: Badge collection grid (First Fruits, 100 Club, On Fire, etc.)

harvest_d2d_features_verified.dark_theme: Fully converted from gray/white to zinc-800/900 with orange accents
